content: Hey @Taylor Cramer -- you around now to chat a bit about organizing async?

I had a few questions. First of all, I feel like there's a variety of repos that I think I don't really have a good handle on who is maintaining them. I can think of maybe 3 but I suspect there are more and I'd like to sort of get a good list:

  • futures crate
  • rust async book
  • pin-utils

Note that I didn't say nobody is maintaining them, I'm sure people are, but I feel like I'm not all that aware of it, and I feel like we could do a better job sort of integrating that into a coherent group.
Side note that I added a async-foundations topic to those repositories to help us in finding them in the future
oh hmm topics, maybe they aren't what I thought they were
probably better to just keep a "master list" in the wg-async-foundations repository

futures crate

I'm still merging PRs and doing releases and such, but not doing any active contribution myself at the moment.

rust async book

I think it's fair to say there's been pretty little maintenance here. I poke at it every once in a while to check for PRs, but I'm not making changes to it.

pin-utils

This one is definitely in @Taiki Endo's hands.
Also, I didn't get this ping yesterday, sorry-- I'm not sure why.
I found out about it today via email
@Taylor Cramer ok -- are those the only crates you can think of?
@nikomatsakis I don't have other ones in mind at the moment, but I'll let you know if I think of more!

futures crate

I'm still merging PRs and doing releases and such, but not doing any active contribution myself at the moment.

@Taylor Cramer: I would be happy to help with the maintenance of futures crate if help is needed.
@Taiki Endo absolutely! You've already been enormously helpful-- your work has been awesome, so thank you!
I'm glad to help :)
@Taylor Cramer Would you give me write permission on futures-rs? I have a lot of PRs and issues I'd like to merge/close (20 over, including UB fix).
I think the ideal thing would be to add you to an appropriate team
I can add wg-async-foundations group to that repo
Thanks, I confirmed wg added to it.
@Taiki Endo are you a member of the wg? I meant to follow up on that but got distracted :)
ah, looks like yes, presuming you are taiki-e
Yes, my github username is taiki-e.
@nikomatsakis thanks! :)
